replies.body: It's not just the armor that weighs him down.. *Queue Naut joke*
{{champion:111}} "Sometimes I think this anchor just weighs me down"
lol i already use naut supp because i thought naut was a supporter until some guy said he was a jg champion
Is support Nautilus *really* that unexpected now?

Lol i have gone naut sup so many times he is perfect for the role so much cc
{{champion:111}}
Lol I thought {{champion:201}}  was a top lol guess we all have those moments

It's all good, but basically they're just surmising his abilities and noting the relevant strengths in this particular role. There's not a great deal of specific game-play discussion, or any reasoning as to why this is better than choosing a dedicated support. Something like a break-down of possible starting item routes and a map with particularly good positions to hook enemies/good places to hook to safety would have added a lot.

"Dark Horse"

Yeah totally hasn't been done in pro stuff before, you know and totally isn't FoTM
Don't think he should be a support{{summoner:4}}

Yeah, I agree.
ADC's the way for him........{{champion:111}}

Hello my old main. Come in. Have some tea.

You're welcome *anytime.*
When I started I always thought {{champion:111}} was a support...
